name: Macrotransaction
description:
Not enough ads in your favorite mobile games? If so, Macrotransaction is just what you've been looking for! Experience a variety of advertisements without too much pesky gameplay stopping you from enjoying some good old fashioned subliminal manipulation.

Tap the Shrine of Ambivalent Coercion to gain as many followers as you can in the shortest amount of time.

Play the double or nothing challenge to boost your follower count or lose them all!

Once everyone is your follower you can start the game over and try for a faster time. Or you can just keep clicking...

This version of Macrotransaction does not contain pop-up ads. Please download from the Google Play Store to unlock these features.

Contact:

Email - studioactual@outlook.com
